Description: kind of layer into RB or Mobility Servers. Layer ontology describes data domain Reactive Box and other elements of this entity
Unique id of Device into system
Representation of geo-point of current position of event
Used to specify ranges for qualities that act as conditions on a system/sensor's operation
The closeness of agreement between the value of an observation and the true value of the observed quality
The value of the result of an Observation.
